title: How to Become a Vampire in Sims 2

steps.title: Add a Downtown to your neighborhood.
steps.content: Add a Downtown to your neighborhood. Vampires don't show up unless they're Downtown.

steps.title: Travel Downtown after dark.
steps.content: Travel Downtown after dark. After 7 PM in-game, use the phone to call a taxi, or use your Sim's car. Direct them to go to a community lot downtown.

steps.title: Look for a Grand Vampire.
steps.content: Look for a Grand Vampire. Grand Vampires are fairly easy to spot - between their signature "bleh", walking with their arm over their face, and their unique appearance, you'll notice them as soon as they walk onto the lot. Gray skin Red eyes Fangs visible when they talk Victorian clothing Name beginning with "Count" (for males) or "Contessa" (for females)

steps.title: Improve your Sim's relationship with the vampire.
steps.content: Improve your Sim's relationship with the vampire. Have your Sim start interacting with the vampire, and focus on improving their relationship. You'll need a relationship of at least 50, though you may want to aim for higher.

steps.title: Let the vampire bite your Sim.
steps.content: Let the vampire bite your Sim. Once your Sim's relationship with the Grand Vampire is high enough, the Grand Vampire will eventually bite your Sim of their own accord. Your Sim will immediately transform into a vampire after being bitten. The Grand Vampire will then continue to bite other Sims, even if they don't have a high relationship with them, so you might want to leave the lot to protect other Sims.

steps.title: Enter the household of the Sim that you want to make a vampire.
steps.content: Enter the household of the Sim that you want to make a vampire.

steps.title: Press Ctrl+⇧ Shift+C.
steps.content: Press Ctrl + ⇧ Shift + C . This will open the cheat window.

steps.title: Type boolprop testingcheatsenabled true.
steps.content: Type boolprop testingcheatsenabled true . Hit ↵ Enter to enable the cheat.

steps.title: Hold down ⇧ Shift and click your Sim.
steps.content: Hold down ⇧ Shift and click your Sim. Multiple options will come up; you may need to click More... .

steps.title: Click on Make Vampire.
steps.content: Click on Make Vampire . Your Sim will immediately be turned into a vampire. Your Sim will not gain the memory of becoming a vampire if you cheat. If you want the memory, you'll need to become a vampire the normal way.

steps.title: Keep your vampire inside during the day.
steps.content: Keep your vampire inside during the day. Because vampire Sims will die if exposed to the sun , you'll want to keep them indoors, away from windows or other sources of light. While just being indoors will have your Sim's needs decline at a typical pace, being in the sun will cause your Sim's needs to plummet. Your Sim can sleep in a coffin to protect themselves from the sun, which will freeze their needs.

steps.title: Have your Sim live their life during the night.
steps.content: Have your Sim live their life during the night. Being creatures of the night, vampire Sims will have their needs frozen during the night, making it an ideal time to do whatever you choose.

steps.title: Turn other Sims into vampires.
steps.content: Turn other Sims into vampires. Any vampires can turn other Sims into vampires as long as they have a Lifetime Relationship of at least 50. Click on the Sim you want to turn and choose Bite Neck .

steps.title: Cure your Sim of vampirism if you get bored.
steps.content: Cure your Sim of vampirism if you get bored. If you don't want your Sim to be a vampire anymore, call the matchmaker and purchase the Vamprocillin-D potion for 60 Simoleons. The potion will be placed in their inventory. Direct your vampire to drink the potion and they'll be cured immediately.
